wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Richard McDevitt (4 March 1929 – 15 February 2021) was an English footballer who played as a winger for Tranmere Rovers and Rhyl.McDevitt died on 15 February 2021, at the age of 91.

response: *Kenny McDevitt, 91, English footballer (Tranmere Rovers).McDevitt, Kenneth Richard
